headline: Lam Research (LRCX) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) jumped 2.9% in the morning session after Morgan Stanley raised its price target on the stock to $158 from $137. The firm maintained its "Equalweight" rating on the shares. This adjustment signaled a more positive outlook on the company's valuation from the investment bank. The move came as the semiconductor equipment maker had been drawing interest from investors, reportedly due to its robust financial stance and potential for gr
